text: (Irutit tirppin) velaikkuriya nanam avanukku contamanatu innum, avan ariyamal palankalil etuvum avarrin palaikaliliruntu velippatuvatillai (avan ariyatatu) entap pennum cul kolvatumillai piracavippatumillai (irutit tirppukkana) annalil avan"enakku inaiyakkappattavai enke?" Enru avarkalitam ketpan appotu avarkal"enkalil evarume (avvaru) catci kurupavarkal illai" enru nankal unakku arivittuvitukirom" enru kuruvarkal
